alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 4:30PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Umatilla County through 500 PM PDT... At 430 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pendleton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pendleton, Adams, Helix, Mission, Rieth and northwestern Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
